All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AboutDialog
 
ActionType
The ActionType enum represents the types of actions that can be performed in the game.
AddComputerPlayerCommand
The AddComputerPlayerCommand class implements the GameOperationCommand interface and represents a command to add a computer player to the game.
AddHumanPlayerCommand
The AddHumanPlayerCommand class implements the GameOperationCommand interface and represents a command to add a human player to the game.
AttackPlayerCommand
The AttackPlayerCommand class represents a command to attack a player in the game.
Character
The Character interface represents the target character in a world game.
ComputerControlledPlayer
The ComputerControlledPlayer class extends the AbstractPlayer class and represents a computer-controlled player in the game.
ControllerGuiImpl
 
ControllerGuiInterface
The ControllerGuiInterface interface represents the controller component of the Dr.
ControllerTest
This is a class for testing the controller in isolation.
CustomRandom
The CustomRandom class provides random number generation functionality, allowing for predictable/mock numbers if specified.
CustomRandomInterface
This is an interface for a wrapper for custom random.
DiagramWorldClass
The DiagramWorldClass class represents a graphical representation of the world.
DisplayPlayerInformationCommand
Command class to display information about a specific player in the game.
DisplaySpaceInformationCommand
The DisplaySpaceInformationCommand class represents a command to display information about a specific space in the game.
DrLuckyItem
The DrLuckyItem class represents the items used to kill the target character in the game.
DrLuckyItemTest
The DrLuckyItemTest class is used to test the functionality of the DrLuckyItem class.
DrLuckySpace
The DrLuckySpace class represents a space in the game world.
DrLuckySpaceTest
The DrLuckySpaceTest class is used to test the functionality of the DrLuckySpace class in the world template.
DrLuckyWorld
This class is an implementation of the World interface and represents the world in the game.
DrLuckyWorld.Input
This class is for reading and parsing the input from the file.
DrLuckyWorldDriver
The DrLuckyWorldDriver class is a driver code that demonstrates the gameplay mechanics of the world game.
DrLuckyWorldTest
This tests the Dr Lucky World in the world template.
DummyController
 
GameCharacter
The GameCharacter class represents a game character and implements the Character interface.
GameCharacterTest
This class tests the characters of the game playing it.
GameController
The GameController class simulates the game controller for the Kill Dr.
GameControllerInterface
This is an interface for the controller.
GameMenuItemFactory
 
GameOperationCommand
The GameOperationCommand interface represents a command that can be executed in the game.
GraphicalRepresentationWorldCommand
The GraphicalRepresentationWorldCommand class represents a command to display the graphical representation of the game world.
HumanControlledPlayer
The HumanControlledPlayer class represents a player controlled by a human in the game.
InputTest
This class tests the input parsing.
Item
The Item interface represents an item in the game world.
LookAroundCommand
The LookAroundCommand class represents a game operation command to look around the game world.
MenuItemActionStrategy
The MenuItemActionStrategy interface represents a strategy for executing an action associated with a menu item.
MenuItemFactory
The MenuItemFactory interface represents a factory for creating menu items with specific labels and action commands.
MockWorldModel
This class is mock model for testing the controller in isolation from the model.
MovePlayerCommand
The MovePlayerCommand class represents a game operation command to move the player to a specified space in the game world.
NewGameActionStrategy
The NewGameActionStrategy class implements the MenuItemActionStrategy interface and represents a strategy for executing the action of starting a new game with a new world specification.
NewGameSameWorldActionStrategy
The NewGameSameWorldActionStrategy class implements the MenuItemActionStrategy interface and represents a strategy for executing the action of starting a new game with the current world specification (same world).
Pet
A class representing the target character's pet and implement the target character pet interface.
PetInterface
The PetInterface represents a pet character that can be targeted in the game.
PetMoveCommand
The PetMoveCommand class represents a command to move the pet in the game world.
PickItemCommand
The PickItemCommand class represents a game operation command to pick an item from the game world.
Player
The Player interface represents a player in the game.
PlayerTest
The PlayerTest class is used to test the functionality of the Player classes.
Position
This represents the Position as co-ordinates for spaces of the world.
QuitActionStrategy
The QuitActionStrategy class implements the MenuItemActionStrategy interface and represents a strategy for executing the action of quitting the game.
ReadOnlyWorldModel
 
Space
This represents the space in the world.
World
This represents the entire world template and provides the interface for the world implementation.
WorldHelper
 
WorldPosition
This class is for WorldPosition of space.
WorldSpecificationHelper
 
WorldViewImpl
 
WorldViewInterface
The WorldViewInterface interface represents the view component of the Dr.
